overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a robust social media presence across multiple platforms, with a total of 3,580 followers and active engagement in both academic and professional areas. His content primarily revolves around computational social science and disinformation research, appealing to an audience interested in these fields. Engagement is consistent, with varying levels of interaction across platforms.
